projects.name: Blogging site
projects.description: Developed a blog site using React, JavaScript, and Node.js with JWT authentication and CRUD functionality, operating on a MongoDB database for seamless data management. Implemented an admin panel for authorized users to post new blogs with access control. Enabled efficient data management and secure user authentication.

projects.name: Work-Done
projects.description: Developed a web platform connecting unorganized laborers (carpenters, plumbers, electricians, etc.) with customers, featuring comprehensive profiles, real-time job booking, and customer reviews. Implemented a user-friendly interface for seamless navigation and search functionality, ensuring robust backend support for user authentication, job management, and data security. The project aims to streamline the hiring process and enhance employment opportunities for skilled laborers.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Designed and developed a responsive personal portfolio website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to showcase my skills, expertise, and resume. Created a professional platform to display my projects, achievements, and capabilities. Provided visitors with a comprehensive overview of my abilities and accomplishments.

experiences.description: Full Stack Development Intern with proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, and MySQL. Created two responsive, dynamic web applications during the internship. Skilled in error fixing, optimization, and crafting user-centric interfaces. Eager to contribute in a collaborative environment.

full_output.name: DHANUSH KODI B
achievements_and_awards: Solved 1000+ problem in Skill Rack platform.
